description: This file provides the implementation of the SlapOwoLoao object for the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the Loao object. It is part of the component source code that defines the behavior and lifecycle management of this specific object.

classes.name: SLAP_OWO_LOAO_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object structure representing the Slap Owo Loao Object, containing member variables and function pointers related to its lifecycle and behavior.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapOwoLoaoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new SlapOwoLoao object, setting up its properties and binding its methods.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoLoaoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified SlapOwoLoao object, freeing associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoLoaoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all necessary subordinate objects for the SlapOwoLoao object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoLoaoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the SlapOwoLoao object, setting its core properties and function pointers.
